snippet.title: Space Hunters - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Check out brutal gameplay, combos, and more from Space Hunters in this trailer for the upcoming 2D handmade beat 'em up game, where every punch and kick is fueled by action and greed. Join space bounty hunters and battle your way through a gritty, money-driven universe. Space Hunters will be available on Steam, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PlayStation.
